import-definition.name: RI WBL Class import
import-definition.documentation:
• Import file must be in .cvs format
  • The file must contain all of the following columns with these headers:
    • SASID
    • School
    • Course
    • Section
    • all-ssc-WBLType
    • all-ssc-WBLSector
    • all-ssc-WBLPartner
    • all-ssc-WBLHours
    • all-ssc-WBLHoursPaid
  • Additional columns (with headers) can be in the import file (such as Name) but additional columns will not import. 
  • The only columns that can be empty for a student are all-ssc-WBLPartner, all-ssc-WBLHours, all-ssc-WBLHoursPaid.  All other fields are required, or the record will not import.
